2.0.0.name: wordpress/affilitate-link-cookie-maker
2.0.0.description:
To make sure affiliate link cookies are activated upon page visit and not by link clicking. Put the shortcode in stead of a normal link Use: [afflink url="url" name="name"]

Please read the FAQ about the question if it is legal to use this technique!
